subject: This is Mr. David Luckson from
body:
This is Mr. David Luckson from the JP Morgan chase international Bank
in New York, Am please to inform you that the Ministry OF Foreign
Affairs from Benin Republic deposited a total sum of,$8.500, 000.00
Million USD as a compensation to be send to you into your
account.
Please kindly comply us with by reply to my email with your
Name,email,home address,and Bank Account information where you want us
to transfers this fund for you from our office today.
Waiting urgently for your email reply for the transaction of this fund
into your account today.
You are advise to contact Mr. David Luckson e-mail with your full
information.such as
Your name........................
Your country......................
Your phone number.........
Your address.....................
Your Occupation................
For more information contact Mr.David Luckson immediately you receive
this email. call or text him +1(205) 614-3493),Email
(
mrdavidluckson@gmail.com
)
Best Regard
Mr David Luckson
International Payment Approval JP Morgan chase international Bank in New York.
+1(205) 614-3493)

subject: Re: This is Mr. David Luckson from
body:
Hello Mr. David Luckson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well. I received your email regarding the Ministry of Foreign Affairs from Benin Republic depositing a large sum of money into my account. This sounds quite interesting, but I would like to know more details before proceeding.

Could you please provide me with some additional information? Specifically, I would like to know how this opportunity came about and what steps need to be taken in order for the funds to be transferred into my account. Additionally, are there any fees or charges associated with this transaction?

I appreciate your prompt response and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jeff
